example.name: transitive
example.text: The writer [*RNR*-3] and executive producer [*RNR*-3] of `` [*] Settle the Score , '' Steve Sohmer , is a graduate of Yale who [*T*-1] participated in a PBS documentary , aired [*] this summer , in which six members of the Yale class of 1963 ruminated about their lives since graduation [*T*-2] .
